title: Adding Intent Media to the list of companies
jshintrc cleanup
body:
- eqnull is a relaxing option, not an enforcing option (http://www.jshint.com/docs/options/)
- trailing has been removed as of jshint 2.5 (https://github.com/jshint/jshint/releases/tag/2.5.0)
- put in alphabetical order

title: Update SublimeLinter.sublime-settings
[in the wild] Muber
Initial pass at style guide updates
Recently forked this for our organization
body: We like spaces in our function definitions - we think it's mostly reasonable.

title: Add TheLadders to the list of organizations that forked this style guide
Add DailyMotion to the list of organizations that are using this style guide
Remove ; from function endings
Add syntax highlighting to noConflict reference
body: Super small change, but it now fits in the with documents consistency.

title: Clarify single newlines at the end of files.
body:
In the process of adopting a variant of this guide at reddit, we encountered some ambiguity in the wording / examples of EOF style. It is possible to interpret the current wording as "add an extra blank newline at the end of each file", leading to double newlines. Unicode to the rescue!

cc @ajacksified

![<3](http://37.media.tumblr.com/53d25e7cc90723c9c75bf67a53bf3c6f/tumblr_ml0llcpFFs1qfy2kdo1_r1_500.gif)

title: Add Orion Health to the list of companies in the README.
body:
<3 your style guide, it is very reasonable and its awesome of you guys to open source it!

Apologies for the pull request spam for all the minor changes/additions we thought might be worth contributing back :)

title: Some additional notes on naming conventions
body:
In the process of forking your amazing style guide and porting across some of the differences in our old internal style guide, we found some additional notes on naming conventions we thought might be worth sharing.

Includes recommendations on naming abbreviations, acronyms, constants and class methods.

title: Justify using a leading semi colon before an IIFE.
body: Add justification and some further reading on using a leading semi colon before an IIFE to the Semicolons section. This wasn't immediately obvious to me so thought it could do with the extra detail.

title: Add note to Whitespace section on removing trailing whitespace.
Avoid unnecessary else statements when returning within an if clause.
Note on escaping single quotes in strings.
Note in the Objects and Arrays section on avoiding trailing commas
body: Note in the Objects and Arrays section on avoiding trailing commas with a link to the Commas section.

title: (Very minor) consistent formatting of "// ... stuff ..." comments.
Remove unnecessary extra newline that confused some markdown previewers
body:
The markdown previewer for Atom.io didn't like the double newline inside the code block, it treated it as 2 separate code blocks (which threw out formatting for the rest of the file).

Github seems to handle it, but the extra newline seemed redundant anyway.

title: Add Ripple to list of projects using this style guide
body:
Ripple Labs is a San Francisco based startup building a new open payment protocol for the web.

https://ripple.com
https://www.ripplelabs.com
